content: Glenn may be small in stature, but he is super serious about everything he does. You can always count on Mobai. He organizes every little detail down to the finest point... Um, not counting his penchant for brewing strange tea concoctions.

content: On the way to our planet, the view was just incredible~! Every place has its own unique... vibe!

content: {A想象}I heard some planets are full of swirling sandstorms, some have snowy blizzards, some have gigantic plants, and some even have colorful rivers!

content: Ahh, I just can't stop thinking about it... but for now, we gotta finish tidying up. I'll go check 'em out, swoosh~! One day!

content: They kept saying, "We can't do it without Esassani!"... {A疑惑}Mhm, it must be because of my great driving skills. <style=SizeSmall>You don't think they were using reverse psychology just to get me here, do you?</style>
